channel.title: Help with Fighting difficult
channel.description:
Oh hi! remember me? ^^
Well, i want make my server, and i use cheezscape 80 source. Good, its hard to get a level, i want medium to get level. But i dont remember where is it. To change the experience.
Thank you very much. Oh and now compile is working =)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 12, 2006, 11:56:46 PM[/size][hr]Oh, and if i use testscape, how i get admin account?
TY

item.title: Help with Fighting difficult
item.dc:creator: @2_short_2die 2 short 2die
item.description:
@2_short_2die wrote:

ok so u see
public int CombatExpRate = 1;
change the 1 to like 100 or maybe 1000 ur choice[br][size=1]Posted at: September 15, 2006, 01:28:33 AM[/size][hr]and with that person not bein able to connect try to reset ur server and if he still cant connect ask him wat his client says wen he tryes to log in then post here andill help u from there
